Class AutoCheckMaintenanceCommand

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.common.command.impl.AutoCheckMaintenanceCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
MaintenanceCommand
public class AutoCheckMaintenanceCommand extends Object implements MaintenanceCommand
Concrete implementation of MaintenanceCommand that performs an automatic maintenance check on a vehicle based on component usage hours.

This command queries components associated with a given vehicle number and checks if any component's used hours exceed a defined maintenance threshold. If so, it updates the vehicle's status to "Maintenance".

Threshold for maintenance is defined by MAINTENANCE_THRESHOLD (default 1000 hours).

 Example usage:
 MaintenanceCommand command = new AutoCheckMaintenanceCommand(vehicleDAO, componentDAO, "BUS123");
 command.execute();
This class follows the Command design pattern and encapsulates the maintenance check logic.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the maintenance check.

      Retrieves all components for the specified vehicle and checks if any component has usage hours greater than or equal to the maintenance threshold. If true, updates the vehicle's status to "Maintenance" using VehicleDAO.

      Specified by:
      execute in interface MaintenanceCommand
